eventDecorators.name: NewAdmin
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when price oracle is changed.

eventDecorators.name: NewImplementation
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when price oracle is changed.

eventDecorators.name: NewPendingAdmin
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when price oracle is changed.

eventDecorators.name: Received
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when price oracle is changed.

functionDecorators.name: delegateToImplementation
functionDecorators.description: Delegates execution to the implementation contract. It returns to the external caller whatever the impledmentation returns or forwards reverts.

returnDecorators.description: bytes returned bytes from the delegater.

functionDecorators.name: delegateToViewImplementation
functionDecorators.description: Delegates execution to an implementation contract. It returns to the external caller whatever the implementation returns or forwards reverts There are an additional 2 prefix uints from the wrapper returndata, which we ignore since we make an extra hop.

returnDecorators.description: bytes returned bytes from the delegatecall.

functionDecorators.name: queryCantoBalance
functionDecorators.description: Method to query current balance of CANTO in the treasury using a DELEGATECALL.

functionDecorators.name: queryNoteBalance
functionDecorators.description: Method to query current balance of NOTE in the treasury using a DELEGATECALL.

functionDecorators.name: sendFund
functionDecorators.description: Method to send funds to recipient using DELEGATECALL.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: amount of funds to send to recipient.

functionDecorators.name: setImplementation
functionDecorators.description: Method called by the admin to update the implementation of the delegator.

parameterDecorators.name: implementation_
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the new implementation for delegation.
